thread.title: DeMarcus Cousins won’t have to leave New Orleans; he was traded to Pelicans
thread.title_full: DeMarcus Cousins won’t have to leave New Orleans; he was traded to Pelicans

author: Sacramento Bee sports staff
title: DeMarcus Cousins won’t have to leave New Orleans; he was traded to Pelicans
text:
February 19, 2017 9:34 PM DeMarcus Cousins won’t have to leave New Orleans; he was traded to Pelicans Sacramento Kings forward DeMarcus Cousins is congratulated on his team’s victory by New Orleans Pelicans forward Anthony Davis at Golden 1 Center in Sacramento, Calif., on Sunday, Feb. 12, 2017. They will now be teammates because Cousins was traded to the Pelicans on Sunday, Feb. 19, 2017. Hector Amezcua hamezcua@sacbee.com i 
Sacramento Bee sports staff 
The Kings sent shockwaves across the NBA on Sunday night when they traded three-time All-Star DeMarcus Cousins following the All-Star game. 
Cousins will stay in New Orleans as a member of the Pelicans. 
Here’s how social media reacted:
